welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Bountiful, where the mountains meet small-town charm. Get ready to discover our picturesque landscapes, friendly locals, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Salt Lake City International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, primarily used by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction at Salt Lake City International Airport, set to open in 2020.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
